wikipedia_page.main: Group Captain George Nigel "Geordie" Douglas-Hamilton, 10th Earl of Selkirk,  (4 January 1906 – 24 November 1994) was a Scottish nobleman and Conservative politician.

response: *George Douglas-Hamilton, 10th Earl of Selkirk (1906–1994), Chancellor of the Duchy of Lancaster and Commissioner for Singapore and Southeast Asia, was born at Merley House
* George Douglas-Hamilton, 10th Earl of Selkirk (1906–1994), younger son of the 13th Duke of Hamilton
